elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User add header
User add basic authentication for login
User send "POST" request for login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body firstName present as "RAJ KUMAR" and get the logtoken saved

steps.name: User add headers for to StateList
User send "GET" request for StateList endpoint

steps.name: User add header  for to get CityList
User add request body state id for  get city list
User send "POST" request for CityList endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User verify the cityList response message matches "Chennai" and saved city id

elements.name: Verify add user address to the application through api

steps.name: User add header and bearer authorizations for accessing address endpoints
User add request body for add new address "Raj","Kumar","1234567898","yesodha","33","3378","101","607803","chennai","work"
User send "POST" request for addUserAddress endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the addUserAddress response message matches "Address added successfully" and get the address id saved

elements.name: Verify update user address to the application through api

steps.name: User add header and bearer authorization for accessing address endpoint
User add request body to update new address "RAJ","kUMAR","1234567898","YESODHA","33","3378","101","607803","CUDDALORE","HOME"
User send "PUT" request for update addUserAddress endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User verify the update address response message matches "Address updated successfully"

elements.name: Verify Get User Address to the application through API

steps.name: User add Headers and Bearer authorization for access Get address endpoints
User Send "GET" request for GetUserAddress endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User verify the GetUserAddress response message matches "OK"

elements.name: Verify User get Category List through api

steps.name: User add headers for category List
User send "GET" request for category List endpoint

elements.name: Verify User get Product List through api

steps.name: User add headers for product List
User add request body for product list with category_id and page no "0"
User send "POST" request for product List endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200

User should verify the product List response message matches "OK" with product name of "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"  and save variant id with specifications "500 g"

arguments.val: "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"

elements.name: Place Order through Web application

steps.name: User is on the OMR Branch hotel page
User should login "raj.officialwrkmail@gmail.com","Raju@081194"
User should verify success message after login "Welcome Thoraipakkam OMR Branch, Please Choose ..."
User enter search keyword "Nuts" for product
User select the product name contains "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri" from the product list

arguments.val: "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"

steps.name: User added the product to cart
User add new address "RAJkumar","J","1234567898","YESODHA","Tamil Nadu","Chennai","101","607803","CUDDALORE""Home"
User enter payment details, procced with card type
User should verify order placed success message contains "Order is Confirmed" and save Order number

elements.name: Get User logtoken from login endpoint

steps.name: User add header
User add basic authentication for login
User send "POST" request for login endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the login response body firstName present as "RAJ KUMAR" and get the logtoken saved

elements.name: Verify User able to get all the Order details

steps.name: User add header and bearer authorization for accessing get all the Order endpoints
User send "GET" request for get all order endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the get all order response message matches "OK" and save the order id using order no

elements.name: Verify User able to get the specific Order details

steps.name: User add header and bearer authorization for accessing get all the Order endpoints
User pass order id as query param
User send "GET" request for get specific order endpoint
User should verify the status code is 200
User should verify the get all order response message matches "OK" and verify the product name "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"

arguments.val: "Happilo 100% Natural Premium California Almonds | Premium Badam Giri"

name: Create Order FE and Get order BE

steps.name: User is on the OMR Branch hotel page
User should login "raj.officialwrkmail@gmail.com","Raju@081194"
User should verify success message after login "Welcome Thoraipakkam OMR Branch, Please Choose ..."

User enter payment details, procced with card type
User should verify order placed success message contains "Order is Confirmed" and save Order number
